about_the_game:
~About the trial version.

Zurarararush!!!" is a twin-stick shooter that is easy and intuitive to play.
Players take on the role of a doctor in a micro-suit,
The player is a doctor in a micro-suit who uses a ZURA as a weapon to defeat the virus that has mutated in his body.

In the demo version you can play a 4 minute Score Attack.

In Score Attack you can compete against people from all over the world!
Defeat enemies within a time limit to continue the combo and increase your score.
In order to keep the combo going, you need to collect ZURA.

There are many types of ZURA, and you can shoot different bullets by wearing ZURA.
ZURA can be stacked, so acquiring multiple types of ZURA will dramatically increase your firepower.
The number of bullets (amount of hair) in a ZURA is limited, so you will eventually run out.
The key to success is to keep taking ZURA and maintaining your firepower.

The stress and challenge of a large number of enemies and bullets will keep your brain busy defeating enemies while avoiding them.
From there, by destroying the enemy, you get the pleasure of releasing all that stress at once!
By putting you in a series of trance-like states in a short period of time, just like in an arcade game,
Achieve the feeling of a high by flowing!

Please play!

~Story.

The year 20XX.
A mutated virus has caused a pandemic!
The whole world was filled with fear and anxiety.
Then ZURA, which can attack the virus directly, is developed.
ZURA', which can directly attack the virus,
has been developed and a ray of light shines on the world!
Can you defeat the virus and save the world?

~About the main game.

There are two modes
Arcade mode has a total of 10+α screens.
There are two types of score attack: 4 minutes and infinite.

In Arcade mode, there is a simple story where the Doctor defeats the virus and becomes a hero, with a theme of lovers, parents and children.
There is also a simple story where you become the hero.
Anyone can reach the end by collecting DNA and leveling up like an RPG.

The game is expected to take 20-30 hours to play.

name: Zurarararush!!! Demo
short_description: Zurararush!!! is an easy to play twin-stick shooter! Use your wig as a weapon to defeat the virus that has mutated in your body! Upgrade your character and wig to become stronger! The game is a fun and easy to play twin-stick shooter! A casual arcade style game that you'll want to play every day!
